review: Not disappointed in my purchase at all.
author: Albert  B Luu

review: I love it. Easy to set up.  The remote is great too.
author: Jan Creeger

review: The fire stick was a little different from the way the roku works but it's over all a great buy. I would definitely recommend it to someone looking for an alternative to cable. I love netflix and sling tv and for 1/3 the cost of cable I have great channels that I actually want to watch and no contract. If you want to complete your television experience get an antenna up to 50 miles and get upto 35 or more local channels. I have way more now than ever before.
author: celia pereira

review: Awesome, great for watching loads of stuff with paying high prices for cable.
author: theresa

review: I bought this during the two day introductory sale for $19. I would without a doubt spend the full $39 for it now. Friends are always asking about it!
author: Justin R.

review: Great product for a great price
author: darren

review: Very easy to setup.  Especially nice in combination with Amazon Prime.  Already watching movies and TV series I missed the first time around.
